item.title: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals coming to PS5, Xbox Series in April
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/dark-deception-monsters-mortals-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-in-april

  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Multiplayer horror game currently available for PC.

Glowstick Entertainment will release multiplayer horror game Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series in April, the developer announced. All of its downloadable content will also be available.

Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals first launched for PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on November 2, 2020.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals is a multiplayer horror game where players take on the role of monsters and mortals from the Dark Deception universe (and others) and battle each other in nightmarish mazes. Some mazes will look familiar to Dark Deception fans, but many will be completely new! Monsters & Mortals has multiple gameplay modes to play with your friends:

  • Maze Escape (Four-versus-Two) – Four mortals must collect the required number of shards to summon the portal and escape, while two monsters seek to stop or kill them before the time expires.
  • Shard Mayhem – Monsters only mode. Six players compete against one another in a free for all to collect the most shards in the time limit provided. Shards spawn in waves and can be stolen from other players by attacking or killing them.
  • Soul Collection – Six Mortals compete for shards in order to save their own soul. At the end of each shard wave, Malak will come for the player with the fewest shards and take their soul. They will become a monster and must hunt down the remaining mortal survivors. In the end, only one mortal will win the right to keep their soul.

Key Features

  • Unique mazes inspired by and taken from the hit game, Dark Deception.
  • Powerful ultimate abilities unique to each character.
  • Turn the tables with trap and boss activations. Monsters & Mortals adds new never-before-seen bosses!
  • Collect item boxes to gain powers, health, trap items, status effects, and more!
  • Waves of shards to collect.
  • Level up to unlock new stat tiers and level rewards!
  • Play as monsters or mortals depending on which game mode you play.
  • Unlock monster and mortal skins, art, new characters, and more in the Store!
  • Instant matchmaking makes playing a game quick and painless!
  • Invite your friends to private matches easily with our invite code system! Play with people you know!

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero version 1.6 update ‘Among the Forgotten Ruins’ launches March 12
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/zenless-zone-zero-version-1-6-update-among-the-forgotten-ruins-launches-march-12

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

More secrets of Sacrifice and the hidden history of New Eridu's military factions.

The version 1.6 update for Zenless Zone Zero, dubbed “Among the Forgotten Ruins,” will launch on March 12, developer miHoYo announced.

Here is an overview of the update, via miHoYo:

Commissioned by the Mayor of New Eridu, Proxies will vie against several factions including the phantom thief syndicate Mockingbird in an exclusive auction to seize a coveted artifact entwined with the Sacrifice’s secrets. Meanwhile, Anby’s true identity gradually emerges, and Trigger, the teammate of Solider 11, will reveal more about the history of New Eridu’s military factions. With new foes including Geppetto in Hollow Zero and varied in-game events, Proxies can expect an enriched and exciting adventure.

In this new chapter of the main story, Proxies are determined to secure an artifact related to Sacrifice in an auction that has ignited tensions among different factions. Amidst the intrigue, Hugo and Vivian appear to be deliberately drawing close to the Proxies, blurring the line between ally and adversary. Beyond the main narrative, players will also uncover Anby’s past before her involvement with the Cunning Hares and gain deeper insights into New Eridu’s military force.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Anby Demara used to be known as Soldier 0 – Anby, the former leader of the Silver Squad. She is an S-Rank Electric Attack Agent, wielding dual swords to rapidly deal Electric damage. Her attack triggers Aftershock as well as amplifying the CRIT DMG of allies targeting the same enemy. Alongside Soldier 0 – Anby, the new S-Rank character Trigger, an Electric Stun Agent and ace sniper of the Obol Squad, will make her debut. When entering Sniper Mode, Trigger can swiftly evade enemy attacks, striking at the opportune moment while calling in teammates for a Quick Assist. Her attack accumulates Purge, enhancing Aftershock damage and increasing damage dealt by allies on the same target. In addition, our familiar friend Pulchra Fellini is making her return in Version 1.6 as an A-Rank Physical Stun Agent under the banner of the Sons of Calydon. In the meantime, S-Rank Fire Anomaly Agent Burnice and S-Rank Ether Attack Agent Zhuyuan will also make their return in the rerun banners.

In Version 1.6, players will get to confront the new boss Geppetto in Hollow Zero and unlock the newly introduced Difficulty VI in Battlefront Purge. Furthermore, players can experience the new Hollow Zero gameplay Shadow Operation, featuring unique effects in every battle stage, such as increasing damage based on accumulated coins. In Trigger’s TV Schedule, a new third-person shooter gameplay will be introduced, allowing players to take on sniper missions. Additionally, Proxies can complete challenges as a Bangboo drone in the March On, Tiny Titan! event or aid a Bangboo in completing 10 different trials in the Little Knight’s Big Charge event to obtain exclusive rewards, including the playable agent Pulchra.

Zenless Zone Zero is available now for for PlayStation 5 via PlayStation Store, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play
